[i]War-God Mjölnir[/i] – When Thórr, War God enters, she deals 3 damage to any target.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Thórr, War God deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 3 life and discards a card, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
[i]Thórr's Wrath[/i] – Whenever another creature you control dies, Thórr deals 1 damage to each opponent.
